FSCCurve.description:
Fourier Shell Correlation curve data.

The `resolution_angstrom` and `fsc_value` arrays must be of equal length, with each value at index i in `resolution_angstrom`
corresponding to the value at index i in `fsc_value`. Both arrays should not exceed 10,000 elements.

description.description: A detailed textual description of this entity

id.description: Globally unique identifier as an IRI or CURIE for machine processing and external references. Used for linking data across systems and semantic web integration.

instruments.description: Instruments used across all studies in this dataset

keywords.description: Keywords or tags describing the dataset for search and categorization

studies.description: Individual research studies contained in this dataset

title.description: A human-readable name or title for this entity
